name: ts-for-gir-gnome-shell-hello-world-example
description: Simple Gnome Shell Hello World Extension example

scripts.build:types: yarn ts-for-gir generate St-1.0 -e gjs -t commonjs
scripts.build: yarn run build:types && yarn run build:app
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:app

author: Pascal Garber <pascal@artandcode.studio>
